name: Failed class students
description:
Would you like to go to school again, In the Failing class students with pen and paper make shot.

same that shooting paper that chew piece of paper and wet it in your mouth after you put it into the pen for throw it to teacher and classmates.

In this game: you inter with "failing students" into the class and you carefully that you don't mistake mission.

after implementing each of mission.we rewards you enter the next class and you get new missions.

I hope you are always welcome to stay with us in this class.
